name: Guy's Dungeon
description:
Entry for The Honest Jam V! Theme: Explore.

My first RPG in a Box game.

Small game in which you play as a guy named Guy Vox who wants to explore a dungeon. Battle slimes in Tactical Turn battles while you a explore a "mostly empty" dungeon. Check your quest log to know what you should do.

The doors in the dungeon need to be clicked twice, I don't really understand why.

Game Controls
